Document.name: FileDialogOptions
Document.enumitem: Add user selected files to "Recent" directory.
Prevent the user to select an unexisting directory.
Prevent the user to select unexisting files.
Prompt if a new file is going to be created.
Promt if a existing file is going to be overwritten.
Document.signature: enum FileDialogOptions { FileDialogAllowMultipleSelection, FileDialogFileMustExist, FileDialogShowReadOnlyCheckBox, FileDialogDereferenceLinks, FileDialogShowNetworkButton, FileDialogPromptCreateFile, FileDialogPromptOverwriteFile, FileDialogDirectoryMustExist, FileDialogAddToRecent, };
